name: The Media Ant
description: The Media Ant, founded in June 2012, is a marketplace for media. Media owners list the details of their media on the site for advertisers to discover and execute. This is a free service both to the media owners and the advertisers. The Media Ant has information for more than 2,00,000 advertising touch points across various offline and online media verticals.
